/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with towering buildings and construction cranes, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the various hues of the buildings and the earthy tones of the street.
